layer.name: Order
layer.definition: Reality has patterns that can be discovered and used.

questions.text: I believe there is a spiritual reality that is ordered and knowable, not random or chaotic.
questions.principle: Spiritual order exists and can be discovered

questions.text: I believe God has established patterns and practices through which He can be known and experienced.
I see evidence of divine order in Scripture, creation, and the lives of faithful people throughout history.
questions.principle: Order is observable in spiritual reality

questions.text: I believe the spiritual disciplines (prayer, Scripture, worship) work because they align with how God designed spiritual reality.
I reject the idea that spiritual experience is purely subjective, random, or meaningless.
questions.principle: Spiritual reality is objective, not arbitrary
